title: Man accused of damaging vehicles on I-74 in Illinois
content: Published: Jun 2nd, 2018 - 5:08pm (EDT)    Updated: Jun 2nd, 2018 - 5:15pm (EDT)        VERMILION COUNTY, Ill. (WTHR) - Police have arrested a Wisconsin man in connection with damage to vehicles on Interstate 74.    Officers arrested Kevin L. Casey, Janesville, on charges of Aggravated Battery to a Child, Aggravated Battery on a Public Way and Criminal Damage to Property.    Illinois State Police had been investigating a rash of reports of damage from motorists on I-74 in Vermillion County.    Police haven't connected the Illinois reports with similar cases reported recently along I-65 in Central Indiana, but more information is expected in a press conference set for Monday, June 4 at the ISP District 10 Headquarters in Pesotum.
